name: Sivi
headline: Sivi - English Speaking Practice App
description:
Sivi is an AI-powered English learning app.

Learn English Speaking The Fastest Way (AI + Human) üòÄ
Practicing with AI English Tutor and Human is the fastest way to learn to speak. Try now to feel the change within a week.

founders.name: Shivam Gupta, Founder
founders.description:
Shivam has 4+ years of working experience at Microsoft and Huawei. He has worked on areas of AI/ML and competed in many Kaggle Competitions. He is also a Kaggle Competition Master.  Shivam has completed his academics from IIT Kharagpur, NIT Allahabad and Delhi University.

"Learning and building things in the journey of life."

founders.name: Anoop Jaiswal, Founder
founders.description: Anoop has 2+ years of working experience at Kredily. He has worked on areas of software development in HRMS area. Anoop has completed his academics from NIT Jamshedpur.

founders.name: Akshay Sanghai, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Akshay has 6+ years of experience at Visa and Booking.com. He has worked on cloud networking and network automation at Visa and built multiple products for Booking.com hotel page. Akshay has a B.Tech degree from IIT Roorkee.

generated_description:
**Company Name:** Sivi

**Website:** [mysivi.ai](https://www.mysivi.ai/)

**Founded:** 2022

**Location:** Bengaluru, India

**Team Size:** 10 employees

**Y Combinator Batch:** W22

### Mission:
Sivi is all about revolutionizing English learning. Their focus is on providing an AI-powered English speaking practice app that combines the efficiency of artificial intelligence with the nuance of human interaction. This dual approach allows learners to practice with both an AI English tutor and real people‚Äîpromoting the fastest possible learning experience.

### Product:
Sivi's core offering is a user-friendly app that claims to be the quickest way to learn spoken English. Users can expect visible improvements in their speaking abilities within just a week of use. This is not your typical language app; it‚Äôs designed to adapt to the needs of learners through AI enhancements.

### Market Position:
Sivi is categorized under multiple tags: AI-enhanced learning, education, e-learning, and consumer. This positioning reflects a commitment to modern educational technologies that cater to today‚Äôs learners.

### Partnerships:
Sivi has partnered with 'nan' as their Group Partner, which likely contributes to their strategic development and growth initiatives.

### Conclusion:
Sivi is a fresh entrant in the edtech space, leveraging the latest in AI to offer a compelling solution for English language learners. With a compact team and the backing of Y Combinator, the company is poised to make a significant impact in the realm of language learning. Whether you're looking to enhance your speaking skills for personal growth or professional purposes, Sivi presents a promising option in the educational tech landscape.

Feel free to check out their [home page](https://www.mysivi.ai/#home-header) to dive deeper into their features and offerings!
